_sText:
This is a small CSS map, where the CT need to bring the hostages to another team of CT, but between these teams stands the opposing Terrorist forces. In the middle of darkness will you be able to live?

Features:
Night with some lighting and fire.
Two houses for CT start.

Install:
Extract the map file (cs_desert_attack_gpk.bsp), and the navigation file (many_houses_wcs.nav) to your Counter-Strike maps folder (Usually located here:C:\Program Files\steam\steamapps\***YOURNAMEHERE***\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps).

Author: GabrielPapaK

Time: 4-5 Hours.

Hope you enjoy!
